explanation: [0-0] In front of a window with pink curtains, a man wearing a white shirt, jeans and a black cap is sitting on a sofa, holding a black pot in both hands. Beside him, a little girl in a purple top, black pants and a ponytail is looking at him. In front of them is a black marble table with gold trim, on which sits a transparent plastic bottle.

[0-2] The man moves the pot in his hands closer to the bottle in front of him, tilting it to pour water into the bottle. A lot of water spills outside the bottle. Seeing this, the little girl turns around and takes a transparent funnel from the right, waving it at the man.

[0-2] The man moves the pot in his hands closer to the bottle in front of him, tilting it to pour water into the bottle. A lot of water spills outside the bottle. Seeing this, the little girl turns around and takes a transparent funnel from the right, waving it at the man.

[2-6] Then the man stops pouring water and looks at the little girl. With the man's help, the little girl places the funnel on the mouth of the bottle. Because the funnel is placed upside down on the bottle, it falls into the black pot next to the water bottle after the man lets go. The man then takes out the funnel and puts it upside down on the mouth of the bottle again.
